thread.section_title: Pool Supplies Superstore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pool Supplies Superstore | poolsuppliessuperstore.com
thread.title: James Parsley
thread.title_full: Pool Supplies Superstore reviewed by James Parsley

author: James Parsley
title: James Parsley
text:
Ordered a new pool cover. Their ordering process and size descriptions were easy to follow. I actually made a mistake ordering my cover (went off memory for pool length vs measuring) and ordered the wrong cover. After contacting their customer service they quickly helped process a replacement. Very happy and surprised with their customer service.
Definitely recommend this store.
